profile.merchantDefaultSet: Merchant mode default set ho gaya
profile.setDefaultError: Default role set karne mein nakami
profile.logoutConfirm: Kya aap waqai logout karna chahte hain?
profile.logoutFailed: Logout karne mein nakami. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.
profile.switchMessage: Kya aap waqai consumer mode par switch karna chahte hain?
profile.privacyPolicyMerchantSubtitle: Tajiron ke liye razdari ki malumat
profile.privacyPolicyConsumerSubtitle: Sareefin ke liye razdari ki malumat
profile.privacyIntroductionText: Around You mein khush aamdeed. Hum aap ki razdari ki hifazat karne aur yeh yaqeeni banane ke paband hain ke aap ki zaati malumat mehfooz aur zimmedari se handle ki jayen. Yeh razdari ki policy wazahat karti hai ke jab aap hamari mobile application aur khidmat istemal karte hain to hum aap ki malumat kaise jama, istemal, afsha aur mehfooz karte hain.
profile.privacyInfoCollected: Hum kya malumat jama karte hain
profile.privacyPersonalInfo: Zaati malumat: Naam, email, phone number, delivery ke pate
profile.privacyOrderInfo: Order ki malumat: Order ki tafseelat, adaigi ki malumat, len deen ke records
profile.privacyLocationInfo: Maqam ka data: Dastiyab dukan dikhane, delivery zone ki tasdeeq, aur delivery fee ka hisab lagane ke liye
profile.privacyDeviceInfo: Device ki malumat: Device ki shanakht, app istemal ka data
profile.privacyMerchantAccountInfo: Tajir account ki malumat: Dukan ki tafseelat, tasdeeqi dastavez, karobari malumat
profile.privacyShopInfo: Dukan ki malumat: Dukan ke maqamat, inventory, delivery zones, kaam ke auqat
profile.privacyOrderData: Order ka data: Customer orders, delivery ki malumat, adaigi ke records
profile.privacyCustomerData: Customer ki malumat: Order ki takmeel ke liye aap ke sath share ki gayi (naam, pate, rabte ki tafseelat)
profile.privacyHowWeUse: Hum aap ki malumat kaise istemal karte hain
profile.privacyUseOrderProcessing: Order ki processing: Aap ke orders ko process, poora aur deliver karne ke liye
profile.privacyUseCommunication: Mawaslat: Order ki tasdeeq, haisiyat ki updates, aur delivery notifications bhejne ke liye
profile.privacyUsePersonalization: Zaati noiyat: Aap ki tarjeehat ki bunyaad par mawad aur sifarishat ko zaati banane ke liye
profile.privacyUseLocation: Maqam ki khidmat: Dastiyab dukan dikhane, delivery zone ki tasdeeq, aur delivery fee ka hisab lagane ke liye
profile.privacyUseShopManagement: Dukan ka intizam: Aap ki dukan, inventory, aur delivery ki tarteebat ko munazzam karne ke liye
profile.privacyUseOrderFulfillment: Order ki takmeel: Customer orders ko process aur poora karne ke liye
profile.privacyUseCustomerSharing: Customer ki malumat ka ishtirak: Hum order ki takmeel ke liye customer ki delivery ki malumat aap aur aap ke riders ke sath share karte hain
profile.privacyUseAnalytics: Tajziyat: Aap ki dukan ki karkardagi aur customer ke rawaye ke bare mein basirat faraham karne ke liye
profile.privacySharingWithMerchants: Jab aap order dete hain, to hum aap ki order ki tafseelat, delivery ka pata, aur rabte ki malumat us tajir ke sath share karte hain jis se aap order dete hain. Tajir yeh malumat apne riders ke sath delivery mukammal karne ke liye share kar sakta hai.
profile.privacySharingNote: Note: Tajir aur un ke riders azad idare hain. Hum zimmedar nahi hain ke tajir ya un ke riders aap ki malumat kaise handle karte hain.
profile.privacyMerchantSharing: Hum order ki takmeel ke liye customer ki malumat (order ki tafseelat, delivery ke pate, rabte ki malumat) aap aur aap ke namzad riders ke sath share karte hain. Aap qabil-e-ittilaq razdari ke qawaneen ke mutabiq is malumat ko handle karne ke zimmedar hain.
profile.privacyMerchantResponsibility: Ek tajir ke taur par, aap ke paas apni razdari ki policies ya data handling ke tareeqe hone chahiye jo customer data process karte waqt qabil-e-ittilaq qawaneen ke mutabiq hon.
profile.privacyRightAccess: Rasai: Aap app ke zariye apni zaati malumat tak rasai hasil kar sakte hain aur un ka jaiza le sakte hain
profile.privacyRightCorrection: Tasheeh: Aap kisi bhi waqt ghalat malumat ko update ya durust kar sakte hain
profile.privacyRightDeletion: Hazf: Aap apne account aur mutaliqa data ki hazf ki darkhwast kar sakte hain
profile.privacyRightOptOut: Opt-out: Aap tashheeri mawaslat se opt-out kar sakte hain
profile.privacyDataSecurityText: Hum aap ki zaati malumat ki hifazat ke liye munasib takneeki aur tanzimi iqdamat nafiz karte hain, bishumol khufiya kari, rasai ke controls, aur mehfooz storage. Taham, internet par transmission ka koi tareeqa 100% mehfooz nahi hai.
profile.privacyContactText: Agar aap ke is razdari ki policy ya hamare data ke tareeqon ke bare mein koi sawalat, khadshaat, ya darkhwast hain, to barah-e-karam hum se ar162387@gmail.com par rabta karein
profile.privacyFullPolicyMessage: Yeh aham razdari ki malumat ka khulasa hai. Tamam hisson, sharait, aur qanooni tafseelat samet mukammal razdari ki policy ke liye, barah-e-karam mukammal dastavez parhain:
profile.feedbackSubmitted: Aap ki raye ka shukriya! Hum jald is ka jaiza lein ge.
profile.feedbackError: Jama karane mein nakami. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein ya barah-e-raast ar162387@gmail.com par hum se rabta karein
profile.deleteAccountSubtitle: Apne account aur data ko mustaqil taur par hazf karein
profile.deleteAccountWarningMessage: Apna account hazf karna aap ke tamam data ko mustaqil taur par hata dega. Isay wapas nahi kiya ja sakta.
profile.deleteAccountMerchantPrerequisite: Apna account hazf karne se pehle aap ko tamam {{count}} dukan(ain) hazf karni hongi.
profile.deleteAccountConsumerPrerequisite: Apna sareef account hazf karne se pehle aap ko apna tajir account hazf karna hoga.
profile.deleteAccountInfo: Aap ka sareef account aur profile ki malumat
profile.deleteAddresses: Aap ke mehfooz shuda delivery ke pate
profile.deleteCartItems: Aap ki cart ki ashya aur tarjeehat
profile.retainTransactionRecords: Len deen ke records (qanooni taeemil ke liye, aam taur par 7 saal)
profile.completeDeletionMessage: Len deen ke records samet mukammal account hazf ke liye, barah-e-karam ek rasmi darkhwast jama karwain:
profile.deleteAccountConfirmMessage: Kya aap waqai apna account hazf karna chahte hain? Yeh amal wapas nahi kiya ja sakta.
profile.deleteAccountSuccessMessage: Aap ka tajir account kamyabi se hazf ho gaya hai.
profile.deleteAccountConsumerMessage: Aap ka tajir account hazf ho gaya hai. Apne sareef account aur tamam mutaliqa data ko mukammal taur par hazf karne ke liye, barah-e-karam hazf modal mein faraham karda link ka istemal karte hue ek rasmi hazf ki darkhwast jama karwain.
profile.deleteAccountError: Account hazf karne mein nakami. Barah-e-karam dobara koshish karein.

profile.feedbackNote: Aap ki raye humein apni khidmat ko behtar banane mein madad karti hai. Hum aap ke waqt ki tareef karte hain aur jald hi aap ke paigham ka jaiza lein ge.

distanceForm.description: Faslay par mabni qeematon ki darja bandi tarteeb dein. Ziyada tar tajar khudkar mode istemal karte hain.

distanceForm.customModeDesc: Hasb-e-zaroorat mode aap ko apni darja bandi set karne deta hai
distanceForm.fixValidationErrors: Barah-e-karam mehfooz karne se pehle tasdeeq ki ghaltiyon ko durust karein.

distanceForm.linearScalingDesc: Akhri darjay se agay faslon ke liye, lekhari scaling lagoo karein. Default: +Rs 10 per 250m
distanceForm.linearScalingExample: Misaal: Agar akhri darja 1000m par khatam hota hai aur fasla 1500m hai, to izafi 500m par {{fee}} PKR per {{unit}}m charge kiya jayega
distanceForm.mustBeGreater: Pichlay darjay se ziyada hona chahiye
distanceForm.mustNotExceed: Ziyada se ziyada delivery fee ({{amount}} PKR) se ziyada nahi hona chahiye

faq.title: Aksar Puchhe Jane Wale Sawaalat
faq.subtitle: Merchant platform istemal karne ke bare mein aam sawaalat ke jawab talash karein

account.title: Account aur Tasdeeq
account.a1: Merchant account banane ke liye, apne profile par jayein aur 'Merchant par switch karein' select karein. Aap se apni dukan ki qisam aur dukano ki tadaad ke bare mein registration survey mukammal karne ko kaha jayega. Survey mukammal karne ke baad, aap apni pehli dukan banana shuru kar sakte hain.
account.q2: Mujhe apni shanakht ki tasdeeq kyun karni chahiye?
account.a2: Hamari platform ki security aur qabil-e-etimadiat ko yaqeeni banane ke liye shanakht ki tasdeeq zaroori hai. Aap ki dukanein gaahko ko is waqt tak nazar nahi aayengi jab tak aap ki shanakht ki tasdeeq nahi ho jati. Tasdeeq ke liye aap ko apni CNIC ki tafseelat (CNIC ke mutabiq naam, CNIC number, aur miyaad khatam hone ki tareekh) jama karvani hongi.
account.q3: Tasdeeq mein kitna waqt lagta hai?
account.a3: Tasdeeq mein aam taur par 1-3 karobari din lagte hain. Jama karvane ke baad, aap ki haisiyat 'Zer-e-iltwa' dikhayi jayegi. Jab aap ki tasdeeq manzoor ho jayegi aur aap ki dukanein gaahko ko nazar ane lagein to aap ko ittila di jayegi.
account.q4: Agar meri tasdeeq mustard ho jaye to kya hoga?
account.a4: Agar aap ki tasdeeq mustard ho jaye, to aap ko wajah ke sath ittila milegi. Aap apni malumat ko update kar sakte hain aur tasdeeq form dobara jama karwa sakte hain. Yaqeeni banayein ke tamam CNIC ki tafseelat bilkul waise hi milen jaise woh aap ke shanakhti dastavez par zahir hoti hain.
account.q5: Kya main merchant aur consumer modes ke darmiyan switch kar sakta hoon?
account.a5: Haan, aap kisi bhi waqt apne profile se merchant aur consumer modes ke darmiyan switch kar sakte hain. Aap ek mode ko apne default ke taur par bhi set kar sakte hain taake app khud ba khud us mode mein khul jaye.

shop.title: Dukan ka Intizam
shop.a1: Merchant registration mukammal karne ke baad, apne merchant dashboard mein 'Dukanein' tab par jayein aur 'Naya dukan banayein' par tap karein. Aap ko dukan ka naam, tafseel, qisam, pata (naqshe par select karein), aur ikhtiyari taur par tags aur dukan ki tasveer shamil karni hogi. Banane ke baad, aap inventory, delivery ki tarteebat, aur khulne ke auqat ka intizam kar sakte hain.
shop.q2: Main kitni dukanein bana sakta hoon?
shop.a2: Aap ek merchant account ke tehet mutadid dukanein bana sakte hain. Registration ke dauraan aap ne jo dukano ki tadaad batayi hai woh aap ko mehdood nahi karti - aap zaroorat ke mutabiq mazeed dukanein shamil kar sakte hain. Har dukan ki apni inventory, delivery ke ilaqe, aur tarteebat hoti hain.
shop.q3: Main apni dukan ki malumat kaise tarmeem karun?
shop.a3: Apne dukan portal par jayein aur 'Tarteebat' tab par tap karein. Wahan se, aap dukan ka naam, tafseel, qisam, pata, tags, aur tasveer tarmeem kar sakte hain. Tabdeelian fori taur par mehfooz ho jati hain aur gaahko ko nazar aayengi.
shop.q4: Kya main dukan hata sakta hoon?
shop.a4: Haan, aap apne dukan portal mein tarteebat tab se dukan hata sakte hain. Note karein ke dukan hata ne se tamam mutaliqa data hata ho jayega jis mein inventory, delivery ki tarteebat, aur order ki tareekh ke hawale shamil hain. Yeh amal wapas nahi kiya ja sakta.
shop.q5: Dukan ke tags kya hain aur woh kaise madad karte hain?
shop.a5: Dukan ke tags woh kalidi alfaaz hain jo gaahko ko aap ki dukan talash karne mein madad karte hain. Misaalon mein khasosiyat, maqbool ashya, ya mufeed khasosiyat shamil hain. Tags talash ke nataij mein aap ki dukan ki daryaft ko behtar banate hain.
shop.q6: Meri dukan gaahko ko kyun nazar nahi aa rahi?
shop.a6: Aap ki dukan nazar nahi aa sakti agar: (1) Aap ke merchant account ki tasdeeq abhi zer-e-iltwa hai ya tasdeeq shuda nahi hai, (2) Aap ki dukan band hai (khulne ke auqat check karein), (3) Koi delivery ke ilaqe set nahi kiye gaye, ya (4) Aap ki dukan mein faal inventory ki ashya nahi hain. Apne dukan portal mein in tarteebat ko check karein.

inventory.title: Inventory ka Intizam
inventory.q1: Main apni inventory mein ashya kaise shamil karun?
inventory.a1: Apne dukan portal par jayein aur 'Inventory' tab select karein. 'Naya item shamil karein' par tap karein taake ek hasb-e-zaroorat item banayein, ya 'Template se select karein' taake pehle se bhare hue item templates istemal karein. Hasb-e-zaroorat ashya ke liye, aap ko naam, SKU, qeemat darj karni hogi, aur zumre tafweez karne honge. Template ashya mein naam aur tafseelat pehle se bhari hoti hain lekin aap qeemat aur SKU set karte hain.
inventory.q2: Hasb-e-zaroorat ashya aur template ashya mein kya farq hai?
inventory.a2: Hasb-e-zaroorat ashya mukammal taur par aap ke zariye banayi jati hain - aap naam, tafseel, SKU, qeemat, aur tasveer ko control karte hain. Template ashya ek mushtarik catalog par mabni hain jahan naam, barcode, aur tafseel markazi taur par munazzam kiye jate hain. Template ashya ke liye, aap sirf qeemat aur SKU set karte hain. Template ashya dukano mein mustaqil mizaji barqarar rakhne mein madad karti hain.
inventory.q3: Main ashya ko zumre mein kaise munazzam karun?
inventory.a3: Pehle, 'Zumre' tab mein zumre banayein. Aap hasb-e-zaroorat zumre bana sakte hain ya zumre ke templates se select kar sakte hain. Phir, jab item banate ya tarmeem karte hain, use ek ya zyada zumre tafweez karein. Ashya behtar tanzim ke liye mutadid zumre se taaluq rakh sakti hain.
inventory.q4: Kya main kisi item ki qeemat tabdeel kar sakta hoon?
inventory.a4: Haan, aap kisi bhi waqt item ki qeematein tarmeem kar sakte hain. Inventory tab par jayein, item talash karein, aur tarmeem ke liye tap karein. Qeemat ki tabdeelian shafaafiat ke liye audit log mein record ki jati hain. Note karein ke template ashya qeemat ki tabdeelion ki ijazat deti hain, lekin naam aur tafseel lock hain.
inventory.q5: 'Faal' aur 'Ghair Faal' ki haisiyat ka kya matlab hai?
inventory.a5: Faal ashya gaahko ko nazar aati hain aur order ki ja sakti hain. Ghair faal ashya gaahko se chhupi hoti hain lekin aap ki inventory mein rehti hain. Aap ashya ko hatae baghair aarzi taur par chhupane ke liye item ki haisiyat ko toggle kar sakte hain. Ghair faal ashya ko dobara faal karne ke liye SKU ki zaroorat hoti hai.
inventory.a6: Audit log aap ki inventory ashya mein tamam tabdeelion ko track karta hai jis mein qeemat ki updates, haisiyat ki tabdeelian, SKU ki tarmeemat, aur template syncs shamil hain. Yeh dikhata hai ke tabdeeli kis ne ki, kab, aur kya tabdeel hua. Yeh shafaafiat barqarar rakhne aur inventory ki tareekh ko track karne mein madad karta hai.

orders.title: Order ka Intizam
orders.a1: Naye orders aap ke merchant dashboard ke 'Orders' tab mein zahir hote hain. Orders waqt ki muddat ke lihaz se group kiye jate hain (Aaj, Kal, Pichhle 7 Din, waghaira). Zer-e-iltwa orders jin ki tasdeeq ki zaroorat hai woh numayan kiye jate hain. Aap mukammal tafseelat dekhne ke liye kisi bhi order par tap kar sakte hain.
orders.q2: Jab mujhe naya order mile to mujhe kya karna chahiye?
orders.a2: Jab aap ko naya order mile: (1) Order ki tafseelat ka jaiza lein jis mein ashya, gaahk ka pata, aur khasosiyat hidayat shamil hain, (2) Order ki tasdeeq karein agar aap use poori kar sakte hain, (3) Ashya tayyar karein, (4) Delivery runner tafweez karein, aur (5) Mukammal hone par 'Delivered' ke taur par nishan zad karein. Agar ashya stock se bahar hain ya deegar jayiz wajohaat ki bina par aap orders mansookh kar sakte hain.
orders.q3: Main delivery runner kaise tafweez karun?
orders.a3: Order ki tasdeeq ke baad, 'Runner tafweez karein' par tap karein. Aap apni dukan ke tamam delivery runners ko un ki mojooda haisiyat (Free ya Delivering kar raha hai) ke sath dekhenge. Ek dastiyab runner select karein ya masroof runner ko order ko qataar mein lagayein. Runner ko ittila di jayegi aur woh gaahk ke pate ke sath order ki tafseelat dekh sakta hai.
orders.q4: Kya main order mansookh kar sakta hoon?
orders.a4: Haan, aap kisi bhi marhale par orders mansookh kar sakte hain (zer-e-iltwa, tasdeeq shuda, ya delivery ke liye rawana). Mansookhi ki wajah select karein jaise 'Stock se bahar' ya 'Deegar wajah'. Gaahk ko mansookhi ki ittila di jayegi. Mansookhi sirf zaroorat ke waqt istemal karein kyunke yeh gaahk ke tajurbe ko mutasir karti hai.
orders.q5: Main order ke tahlilat kaise track karun?
orders.a5: Order ke tahlilat aap ke dukan portal ke 'Dashboard' tab mein dastiyab hain. Aap kul orders, aamdani, wasat order ki qeemat, tasdeeq ka waqt, tayyari ka waqt, delivery ka waqt, aur haisiyat ki taqseem dekh sakte hain. Mukhtalif adwar mein karkardagi ka tahlil karne ke liye waqt ke filter ke zariye filter karein.
orders.q6: Agar gaahk apne order mein tarmeem ya mansookhi chahta hai to kya hoga?
orders.a6: Filhal, gaahk apne orders mansookh kar sakte hain. Agar koi gaahk aap se rabta karta hai ke order mein tarmeem kare, to aap ko mojooda order mansookh karna par sakta hai aur un se kehna parhega ke woh naya order dein. Hum mustaqbil ke liye order ki tarmeem ki khasosiyat par kaam kar rahe hain.

delivery.title: Delivery ka Intizam
delivery.q1: Main delivery ke ilaqe kaise set karun?
delivery.a1: Apne dukan portal par jayein, 'Delivery' tab select karein, aur Delivery Areas ke tehet 'Manage' par tap karein. Naqshe par, 'Add delivery area' par tap karein aur apne service area ke gird ek polygon banane ke liye kam az kam 3 points drop karein. Aap mutadid delivery zones bana sakte hain. Gaahk aap ki dukan sirf is surat mein dekhenge jab un ka pata in zones ke andar ho.
delivery.q2: Kya delivery zones overlap ho sakte hain?
delivery.a2: Nahi, delivery zones overlap nahi ho sakte. Har zone ki wazeh hadood honi chahiye. Agar aap overlapping zones banane ki koshish karte hain, to aap ko ghalti milegi. Yaqeeni banayein ke woh overlap nahi karte ke liye zone ki hadood ko adjust karein.
delivery.q3: Main delivery runners kaise shamil karun?
delivery.a3: Apne dukan portal ke Delivery tab mein, 'Delivery Runners' par jayein aur 'Add' par tap karein. Runner ka naam aur phone number darj karein. Aap mutadid runners shamil kar sakte hain. Runners ko un ke tafweez shuda orders gaahk ki tafseelat aur delivery ke pate ke sath nazar aayenge.
delivery.q4: Delivery ka mantiq kya hai aur yeh kaise kaam karta hai?
delivery.a4: Delivery ka mantiq order ki qeemat ki had aur fees ko control karta hai. Aap set kar sakte hain: (1) Kam az kam order ki qeemat - is se kam orders par surcharge lagta hai, (2) Chhote order ka surcharge - chhote orders mein shamil fee, (3) Kam se kam order ki qeemat - sakht farsh jis se neeche orders mustard ho jate hain, (4) Muft delivery ki had - muft delivery ke liye order ki qeemat aur fasaale ke mayar. Yeh tarteebat delivery ki lagat ka intizam karne aur bare orders ko farogh dene mein madad karti hain.
delivery.q5: Fasaale ki darja bandi kya hai?
delivery.a5: Fasaale ki darja bandi aap ki dukan se fasaale ki bunyad par delivery fee ka hisab lagati hai. Aap 'Auto Mode' default darjo ke sath istemal kar sakte hain, ya 'Custom Mode' apni fasaale par mabni qeemton ko set karne ke liye istemal kar sakte hain. Aakhri darje se aage, linear scaling lagu hoti hai (maslan, +Rs 10 per 250m). Aap zyada se zyada delivery fee ki had bhi set kar sakte hain.
delivery.q6: Gaahko ke liye delivery fee ka hisab kaise lagaya jata hai?
delivery.a6: Delivery fee ki bunyad par hisab lagaya jata hai: (1) Dukan se gaahk ke pate tak fasaala, (2) Order ki qeemat (chhote orders par surcharge ho sakta hai), (3) Fasaale ki darja bandi ki tarteebat, (4) Muft delivery ki ahliat (agar order ki qeemat aur fasaala mayar par utarte hain). System khud ba khud hisab lagata hai aur checkout par fee dikhata hai.

openingHours.title: Khulne ke Auqat aur Dastiyabi
openingHours.q1: Main apni dukan ke khulne ke auqat kaise set karun?
openingHours.a1: Apne dukan portal par jayein, 'Tarteebat' tab select karein, aur 'Opening Hours' par tap karein. Woh din aur auqat set karein jab aap ki dukan orders qabool karti hai. Aap hafte ke har din ke liye mukhtalif auqat set kar sakte hain. System khud ba khud schedule ki bunyad par aap ki dukan ko khula ya band dikhayega.
openingHours.q2: Kya main khule/band ki haisiyat ko dasti taur par override kar sakta hoon?
openingHours.a2: Haan, aap khulne ki haisiyat ke mode ko 'Force Open' ya 'Force Closed' par set kar sakte hain taake schedule ko dasti taur par override karein. Yeh taateelat, khasosiyat taqrebaat, ya ghair mutawaqqa bandishon ke liye mufeed hai. Dasti tarteebat schedule par tarjeeh rakhti hai.
openingHours.a3: Khulne ke auqat ke hisse mein, 'Custom Holidays' par scroll karein aur 'Add a holiday' par tap karein. Tareekh select karein aur mukhtasar tafseel shamil karein (2-6 alfaaz, maslan, 'Eid Holiday'). Taateelat par, aap ki dukan band rahegi chahe schedule khula kahe. Aap kisi bhi waqt taateelat hata sakte hain.
openingHours.q4: Jab meri dukan band ho to orders ka kya hota hai?
openingHours.a4: Jab aap ki dukan band ho, to gaahk naye orders nahi de sakte. Aap ki dukan talash ke nataij ya dukan ki fehriston mein zahir nahi hogi. Mojooda orders jo pehle se tasdeeq shuda ya delivery ke liye rawana hain woh jari rahenge. Agar aap ko ghair mutawaqqa taur par band karne ki zaroorat ho to apni haisiyat ko update karein.

payments.title: Adaigi aur Aamdani
payments.q1: Main gaahko se adaigi kaise wasool karun?
payments.a1: Filhal, platform Cash on Delivery (COD) ki himayat karta hai. Gaahk order deliver hone par naqad raqam se adaigi karte hain. Aap barah-e-rast gaahk ya delivery runner se adaigi wasool karte hain. Card adaigi aur mobile wallet ke ikhtiyarat (JazzCash, Easypaisa) jald aa rahe hain.
payments.q2: Main apni aamdani kaise track karun?
payments.a2: Aamdani ka tracking aap ke dukan portal ke 'Dashboard' tab mein dastiyab hai. Aap kul aamdani, wasat order ki qeemat, aur mukhtalif waqt ki adwar mein aamdani ke rajhnaat dekh sakte hain. Karkardagi ka tahlil karne ke liye Aaj, Kal, Pichhle 7 Din, Pichhle 30 Din, ya Tamam Waqt ke zariye filter karein.
payments.q3: Kya koi platform fee ya commission hain?
payments.a3: Platform fee ke bare mein tafseelat ke liye barah-e-karam apne merchant muahide ka hawala dein. Filhal, tajar Cash on Delivery ke zariye barah-e-rast gaahko ke sath adaigi handle karte hain. Mustaqbil ki adaigi ke tareeqon ke liye, fee ki saakht pehle se batayi jayegi.

troubleshooting.title: Masail ka Hal
troubleshooting.q1: Meri dukan talash ke nataij mein zahir nahi ho rahi. Kya masla hai?
troubleshooting.a1: Yeh aam masail check karein: (1) Tasdeeq karein ke aap ka merchant account tasdeeq shuda hai (zer-e-iltwa nahi), (2) Yaqeeni banayein ke aap ki dukan mein delivery ke ilaqe set kiye gaye hain, (3) Check karein ke aap ke paas faal inventory ki ashya hain, (4) Tasdeeq karein ke aap ki dukan 'Khula' ki haisiyat par set hai, (5) Yaqeeni banayein ke gaahk ka pata aap ke delivery zones ke andar hai. In masail mein se kisi ko bhi theek karein aur aap ki dukan zahir honi chahiye.
troubleshooting.q2: Main delivery runner tafweez nahi kar sakta. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?
troubleshooting.a2: Yaqeeni banayein ke aap ne apni dukan ki delivery ki tarteebat mein kam az kam ek delivery runner shamil kiya hai. Agar runners 'Delivering' ke taur par dikhayen, to aap ab bhi un ko orders ko qataar mein laga sakte hain. Agar koi runners nazar nahi aate, to Delivery tab par jayein aur un ke naam aur phone number ke sath runners shamil karein.
troubleshooting.q3: Orders zahir nahi ho rahe. Masla kya ho sakta hai?
troubleshooting.a3: Yeh aqdaam karein: (1) Orders ki fehrist ko taza karne ke liye neeche kheenchin, (2) Apna internet connection check karein, (3) Tasdeeq karein ke aap sahi account ke sath log in hain, (4) Yaqeeni banayein ke agar aap ke paas mutadid dukanein hain to aap sahi dukan dekh rahe hain, (5) Waqt ke filter ko check karein - Aaj, Kal, waghaira ke darmiyan switch karein. Agar masail barqarar rahen, to log out kar ke dobara log in karein.
troubleshooting.q4: Agar mujhe madad ki zaroorat ho to main support se kaise rabta karun?
troubleshooting.a4: Aap apne profile mein 'Tajweez ya Shikayat' ke ikhtiyar ke zariye support se rabta kar sakte hain. Apne masle ki tafseel se wazahat karein aur hamari team aap se rabta karegi. Fori masail ke liye, aap hamein ar162387@gmail.com par email bhi kar sakte hain. Hum 24-48 ghanton ke andar jawab dene ka hadaf rakhte hain.

address.enterAddress: Apne ird gird dukanain daryaft karne ke liye pata darj karein
address.searchStart: Shuru karne ke liye koi maqam talash karein
address.pinpointHelp: Rider ko apna maqam talash karne mein madad karein
address.pinpointDesc: Hamwar delivery ke liye pin ko bilkul apni imarat ke dakhli rastay par rakhein
address.addDetails: Flat / Makan / Gali number ya mashhoor jagah shamil karein (ikhtiyari)
address.detailsPlaceholder: Misaal: Flat 2B, Makan 45, Main Gate ke qareeb
address.loginPrompt: Apne paton ka intezam karne ke liye barah-e-karam Sign Up / Login karein
address.noSavedAddresses: Abhi tak koi pata mehfooz nahi kiya gaya
address.addFirstAddress: Shuru karne ke liye apna pehla pata shamil karein
address.deleteConfirm: Kya aap waqai yeh pata hazf karna chahte hain?
address.deliveryNote: Aap ka rider pin kiye gaye maqam par deliver karega. Aap aglay safhay par apne likhay hue patay mein tabdeeli kar sakte hain.
address.useCurrentLocationUnavailable: Mera mojooda location istemal karein (Location dastiyab nahi)

faq.title: Aksar Puchhe Jane Wale Sawaalat
faq.subtitle: AroundYou par kharidari ke bare mein aam sawaalat ke jawab talash karein

account.title: Account aur Profile
account.a1: Account banane ke liye, home screen ya profile se 'Sign Up / Login' par tap karein. Aap apne email address ke sath sign up kar sakte hain. Account banane ke baad, aap pate mehfooz kar sakte hain, orders track kar sakte hain, aur apni kharidari ki tarjeehat ka intizam kar sakte hain.
account.q2: Kya main account banaye baghair app istemal kar sakta hoon?
account.a2: Aap account ke baghair dukanein browse kar sakte hain aur ashya dekh sakte hain, lekin orders dene, pate mehfooz karne, aur apni order ki tareekh ko track karne ke liye aap ko account banane ki zaroorat hogi. Account banana muft hai aur sirf chand lamhat lagte hain.
account.q3: Main apni profile ki malumat kaise update karun?
account.a3: Apne profile tab par jayein aur aap apna naam aur email dekhenge. Filhal, profile ki malumat aap ke account ki tarteebat ke zariye munazzam ki jati hain. Agar aap ko apna email ya deegar tafseelat tabdeel karne ki zaroorat ho, to aap ko support se rabta karna par sakta hai.
account.q4: Kya main consumer aur merchant modes ke darmiyan switch kar sakta hoon?
account.a4: Haan, agar aap ke paas consumer account aur merchant account dono hain, to aap apne profile se modes ke darmiyan switch kar sakte hain. Profile → Tarteebat par jayein aur 'Merchant par switch karein' ya 'Consumer par switch karein' par tap karein. Aap ek mode ko apne default ke taur par bhi set kar sakte hain.

shopping.title: Dukanein Talash Karna aur Kharidari
shopping.q1: Main apne qareeb dukanein kaise talash karun?
shopping.a1: Dukanein khud ba khud aap ke muntakhib karda delivery pate ki bunyad par dikhayi jati hain. Yaqeeni banayein ke aap ne delivery ka pata muntakhib kiya hai (home screen ke oopar address bar par tap karein). App aap ke maqam par delivery karne wali tamam dukanein dikhayegi. Aap dukan ki qisam (Grocery, Meat, Vegetable, waghaira) ke zariye filter kar sakte hain ya makhsoos ashya talash kar sakte hain.
shopping.q2: Mujhe koi dukanein kyun nazar nahi aa rahi?
shopping.a2: Agar aap ko dukanein nazar nahi aa rahi, to check karein: (1) Kya aap ne delivery ka pata muntakhib kiya hai? Apna maqam set karne ke liye address bar par tap karein, (2) Kya aap ka pata dukan ke delivery zone ke andar hai? Kuch dukanein sirf makhsoos ilaqon mein deliver karti hain, (3) Kya dukanein khuli hain? Band dukanein nataij mein zahir nahi hongi. Mukhtalif pata muntakhib karne ya dukan ke auqat ke dauraan wapas check karne ki koshish karein.
shopping.q3: Main makhsoos ashya kaise talash karun?
shopping.a3: Aap do tareeqon se ashya talash kar sakte hain: (1) Home screen se, tamam dukano mein ashya talash karne ke liye search bar istemal karein, (2) Jab kisi dukan ko dekh rahe hon, to us dukan ki inventory mein talash karne ke liye search icon par tap karein. Search ke nataij qeemton ke sath ashya dikhate hain aur aap unhein barah-e-rast apni cart mein shamil kar sakte hain.
shopping.q4: Main har dukan ke bare mein kya malumat dekhta hoon?
shopping.a4: Har dukan card dikhata hai: dukan ka naam, tasveer, dukan ki qisam, delivery fee (ya 'Muft delivery'), kam az kam order ki qeemat, khidmat kiye gaye orders ki tadaad, aur dukan fil-waqt khuli hai ya band. Mukammal tafseelat dekhne, zumre browse karne, aur tamam dastiyab ashya dekhne ke liye kisi bhi dukan par tap karein.
shopping.q5: Main dukan mein ashya kaise browse karun?
shopping.a5: Kisi bhi dukan par tap karein taake dukan screen khul jaye. Ashya zumre ke lihaz se munazzam ki jati hain. Aap zumre browse kar sakte hain, kisi zumre mein tamam ashya dekhne ke liye tap kar sakte hain, ya makhsoos ashya talash karne ke liye search icon istemal kar sakte hain. Har item naam, qeemat, aur tafseel dikhata hai. Ashya ko apni cart mein shamil karne ke liye '+' button par tap karein.
shopping.q6: Kya main dukan ki darja bandi ya jayze dekh sakta hoon?
shopping.a6: Filhal, app har dukan ke zariye khidmat kiye gaye orders ki tadaad dikhati hai. Darja bandi aur jayze ki khasosiyat jald aa rahi hain. Aap faisle karne mein madad ke liye dukan ki tafseelat, delivery ki malumat, aur order ki tareekh dekh sakte hain.

cart.title: Kharidari ki Tokri
cart.a1: Har dukan ki apni alag cart hoti hai. Jab aap kisi dukan se ashya shamil karte hain, to woh us dukan ki cart mein jati hain. Aap ke paas mukhtalif dukano ke liye mutadid carts ho sakti hain. Tamam carts dekhne ke liye, Profile → Pate par jayein (ya cart icon par tap karein). Wahan se, aap carts ka intizam kar sakte hain, mazeed ashya shamil kar sakte hain, ya checkout par aage barh sakte hain.
cart.q2: Kya main baad mein istemal ke liye ashya apni cart mein mehfooz kar sakta hoon?
cart.a2: Haan! Aap ki cart khud ba khud mehfooz ho jati hai aur yahan tak ke agar aap app band kar dein to bhi barqarar rehti hai. Ashya aap ki cart mein rehti hain jab tak ke aap order nahi dete, cart hata nahi dete, ya dukan inventory se ashya hata deti hai. Aap apni kharidari mukammal karne ke liye kisi bhi waqt wapas aa sakte hain.
cart.q3: Agar dukan band ho jaye ya koi item dastiyab na rahe to kya hoga?
cart.a3: Agar dukan band ho jaye, to aap us dukan ki cart se checkout nahi kar sakenge jab tak ke yeh dobara khul na jaye. Agar koi item dastiyab na rahe (stock se bahar ya hata diya gaya), to jab aap checkout karne ki koshish karenge to aap ko ittila nazar aayegi. Aap dastiyab na hone wali ashya ko hata sakte hain aur apne baqi order ke sath jari rakh sakte hain.
cart.q4: Kya main apni cart se miqdar mein tarmeem ya ashya hata sakta hoon?
cart.a4: Haan, aap apni cart ki ashya ka intizam kar sakte hain. Cart view mein, aap miqdar ko adjust karne ke liye '-' aur '+' buttons dekhenge, ya aap mukammal taur par ashya hata sakte hain. Tabdeelian khud ba khud mehfooz ho jati hain. Agar zaroorat ho to aap poori dukan ki cart bhi hata sakte hain.

orders.title: Order Dena aur Track Karna
orders.a1: Order dene ke liye: (1) Kisi dukan se ashya apni cart mein shamil karein, (2) Apni carts par jayein (Profile → Pate ya cart icon), (3) Us dukan ki cart muntakhib karein jis se aap order dena chahte hain, (4) Apni ashya ka jaiza lein aur delivery ka pata muntakhib karein, (5) Koi khasosiyat hidayat shamil karein, (6) Order ki kul (delivery fee samet) ka jaiza lein, aur (7) 'Place Order' par tap karein. Aap ko tasdeeq milegi aur aap apne order ko real-time mein track kar sakte hain.
orders.q2: Mukhtalif order ki haisiyat kya hain?
orders.a2: Orders in haisiyat se guzarte hain: (1) Zer-e-iltwa Tasdeeq - dukan ki tasdeeq ka intezar, (2) Aap ka Order Tayyar Kar Raha Hai - dukan ashya tayyar kar rahi hai, (3) Delivery ke Liye Rawana - order delivery runner ke sath raste mein hai, (4) Delivered - order mukammal, (5) Mansookh Shuda - order mansookh kar diya gaya. Aap mojooda haisiyat dekh sakte hain aur taraqqi ko real-time mein track kar sakte hain.
orders.q3: Main apne order kaise track karun?
orders.a3: Aap do tareeqon se orders track kar sakte hain: (1) Faal orders home screen ke oopar ek banner dikhate hain - mukammal tafseelat dekhne ke liye us par tap karein, (2) Tamam orders dekhne ke liye Profile → Orders par jayein. Order ki haisiyat screen real-time updates, delivery runner ki malumat, takhmeeni delivery ka waqt, aur order ki tafseelat dikhati hai.
orders.q4: Kya main apna order mansookh kar sakta hoon?
orders.a4: Haan, aap kuch haisiyat mein orders mansookh kar sakte hain. Aap 'Zer-e-iltwa Tasdeeq' ya 'Aap ka Order Tayyar Kar Raha Hai' wale orders mansookh kar sakte hain. Ek bar jab order 'Delivery ke Liye Rawana' ho jata hai, to mansookhi mumkin nahi ho sakti. Mansookh karne ke liye, order ki tafseelat screen par jayein aur 'Cancel Order' par tap karein. Aap se mansookhi ki tasdeeq maangi jayegi.
orders.q5: Agar mujhe dukan ya delivery runner se rabta karne ki zaroorat ho to kya hoga?
orders.a5: Jab aap ka order 'Delivery ke Liye Rawana' ho, to aap order ki haisiyat screen par delivery runner ka naam aur phone number dekhenge. Aap barah-e-rast un se rabta karne ke liye 'Call' button par tap kar sakte hain. Dukan se mutaliq sawaalat ke liye, aap apne profile mein 'Tajweez ya Shikayat' ki khasosiyat istemal kar sakte hain.
orders.q6: Main apni order ki tareekh kaise dekhoon?
orders.a6: Tamam maazi aur mojooda orders dekhne ke liye Profile → Orders par jayein. Orders tareekh ke lihaz se group kiye jate hain (Aaj, Kal, waghaira). Mukammal tafseelat dekhne ke liye kisi bhi order par tap karein jis mein ashya, delivery ka pata, adaigi ka khulasa, aur delivery ka waqt shamil hai. Aap maazi ke orders ke liye mukammal delivery ke auqat bhi dekh sakte hain.

addresses.title: Delivery ke Pate
addresses.q1: Main delivery ka pata kaise shamil karun?
addresses.a1: Pata shamil karne ke liye: (1) Profile → Pate par jayein, (2) 'Naya Pata Shamil Karein' par tap karein, (3) Apna maqam talash karein ya apne mojooda maqam ka istemal karein, (4) Naqshe par ain delivery ke maqam ko nishan zad karein, (5) Flat/ghar number ya mashhoor maqam jaisi izafi tafseelat shamil karein, (6) Ikhtiyari taur par unwan shamil karein (Ghar/Office), aur (7) Mehfooz karein. Aap mukhtalif maqamat ke liye mutadid pate shamil kar sakte hain.
addresses.q2: Kya main mehfooz shuda pate tarmeem ya hata sakta hoon?
addresses.a2: Haan, aap apne paton ka intizam kar sakte hain. Tamam mehfooz shuda pate dekhne ke liye Profile → Pate par jayein. Kisi bhi pate par tap karein taake use tarmeem karein, ya use hataane ke liye hata ka ikhtiyar istemal karein. Aap kisi bhi waqt maqam, mashhoor maqam, ya deegar tafseelat ko update kar sakte hain.
addresses.q3: 'Ghar' aur 'Office' ke paton mein kya farq hai?
addresses.a3: Ghar aur Office ikhtiyari labels hain jo aap ko apne paton ko munazzam karne mein madad karte hain. Aap ke paas ek 'Ghar' ka pata aur ek 'Office' ka pata ho sakta hai. Yeh labels paton ki shanakht aasan banate hain, lekin aap label ke baghair bhi pate mehfooz kar sakte hain. Aham hissa naqshe par asal maqam hai.
addresses.q4: Ain maqam ko nishan zad karna kyun aham hai?
addresses.a4: Ain maqam ko nishan zad karna delivery runners ko aap ko aasani se talash karne mein madad karta hai. Pin ko apne imarat ke dakhili darwaze ya ain jagah par rakhein jahan aap delivery chahte hain. Yeh hamwar aur durust delivery ko yaqeeni banata hai. Aap runner ko aap ko talash karne mein madad ke liye 'Flat 2B' ya 'Main Gate ke Qareeb' jaisi tahriri tafseelat bhi shamil kar sakte hain.

delivery.title: Delivery aur Fee
delivery.q1: Delivery fee ka hisab kaise lagaya jata hai?
delivery.a1: Delivery fee ki bunyad par hisab lagaya jata hai: (1) Dukan se aap ke delivery pate tak fasaala, (2) Order ki qeemat (chhote orders par surcharge ho sakta hai), (3) Dukan ki delivery ki qeemton ki tarteebat. App khud ba khud hisab lagati hai aur order dene se pehle delivery fee dikhati hai. Kuch dukanein makhsoos qeemat se ziyada ya makhsoos fasaale ke andar orders ke liye muft delivery pesh karti hain.
delivery.q2: Kam az kam order ki qeemat kya hai?
delivery.a2: Bohat si dukanein mufeed delivery ko yaqeeni banane ke liye kam az kam order ki qeemat rakhti hain. Agar aap ka order kam az kam se kam hai, to aap ko chhote order ka surcharge shamil nazar aa sakta hai. 'Kam se Kam Order ki Qeemat' (sakht farsh) se neeche wale orders nahi diye ja sakte. Kam az kam order ki qeemat har dukan card aur cart mein dikhayi jati hai.
delivery.q3: Delivery mein kitna waqt lagta hai?
delivery.a3: Delivery ka waqt dukan aur fasaale ke lihaz se mukhtalif hota hai. Ek bar jab aap ka order tasdeeq shuda ho jata hai aur delivery runner tafweez ho jata hai, to aam delivery ka waqt fasaale, traffic, aur tayyari ke waqt ke lihaz se 30 minute se 2 ghante tak hota hai. Aap apne order ko real-time mein track kar sakte hain taake dekh saken ke yeh delivery ke liye kab rawana hua aur updates hasil karein.
delivery.q4: Agar mera pata dukan ke delivery zone se bahar ho to kya hoga?
delivery.a4: Agar aap ka muntakhib karda pata dukan ke delivery zone se bahar hai, to aap us dukan se order nahi de sakenge. App ek paigham dikhayegi jo batata hai ke pata delivery zone se bahar hai. Dukan ke service area ke andar mukhtalif pata muntakhib karne ki koshish karein, ya deegar dukanein talash karein jo aap ke maqam par deliver karti hain.

payments.title: Adaigi
payments.q1: Kaun se adaigi ke tareeqe qabool kiye jate hain?
payments.a1: Filhal, app Cash on Delivery (COD) ki himayat karti hai. Aap apne order ke aane par naqad raqam se adaigi karte hain. Card adaigi aur mobile wallet ke ikhtiyarat (JazzCash, Easypaisa) jald aa rahe hain. Jab yeh ikhtiyarat dastiyab ho jayenge, to aap checkout ke dauraan online adaigi kar sakenge.
payments.q2: Main apne order ki adaigi kab karun?
payments.a2: Cash on Delivery ke sath, aap us waqt adaigi karte hain jab delivery runner aap ke order ke sath pahunchta hai. Hamwar len deen ke liye yaqeeni banayein ke aap ke paas ain raqam, ya us ke qareeb, tayyar hai. Order ki kul (ashya, surcharge charges, aur delivery fee samet) order dene se pehle dikhayi jati hai taake aap ko bilkul pata ho ke kitna ada karna hai.
payments.q3: Agar mujhe adaigi ke masail hon to kya hoga?
payments.a3: Agar aap ko adaigi ke masail hon, to order ki haisiyat screen par call button istemal karte hue barah-e-rast delivery runner se rabta karein. Tanazuaat ya wapasi ke liye, support se rabta karne ke liye apne profile mein 'Tajweez ya Shikayat' ki khasosiyat istemal karein. Hum adaigi se mutaliq masail ko fori taur par hal karne mein madad karenge.

troubleshooting.title: Masail ka Hal
troubleshooting.q1: Mujhe koi dukanein nazar nahi aa rahi. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?
troubleshooting.a1: Yeh aqdaam karein: (1) Yaqeeni banayein ke aap ne delivery ka pata muntakhib kiya hai - oopar address bar par tap karein, (2) Apna internet connection check karein, (3) Mukhtalif pata muntakhib karne ki koshish karein - kuch ilaqon mein delivery karne wali dukanein nahi ho sakti, (4) Dukan ki fehrist ko taza karne ke liye neeche kheenchin, (5) Yaqeeni banayein ke maqam ki khidmat faal hain. Agar masail barqarar rahen, to app ko dobara shuru karne ki koshish karein.
troubleshooting.q2: Mera order zahir nahi ho raha. Kya masla hai?
troubleshooting.a2: Agar aap ka order zahir nahi ho raha: (1) Orders ki fehrist ko taza karne ke liye neeche kheenchin, (2) Apna internet connection check karein, (3) Yaqeeni banayein ke aap sahi account ke sath log in hain, (4) 'Aaj' filter check karein - mukhtalif waqt ki adwar ke darmiyan switch karein, (5) Agar aap ne abhi order diya hai, to thora intezar karein aur taza karein. Agar masail barqarar rahen, to log out kar ke dobara log in karein.
troubleshooting.q3: Main apni cart mein ashya shamil nahi kar sakta. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?
troubleshooting.a3: Agar aap ashya shamil nahi kar sakte: (1) Yaqeeni banayein ke aap log in hain (kuch khasosiyat ke liye account ki zaroorat hoti hai), (2) Apna internet connection check karein, (3) Tasdeeq karein ke dukan khuli hai (band dukanein cart mein izafe ko mehdood kar sakti hain), (4) Dukan ke safhe ko taza karne ki koshish karein, (5) Yaqeeni banayein ke item stock mein hai. Agar masail jari rahen, to app band kar ke dobara kholne ki koshish karein.
troubleshooting.q4: Main support se kaise rabta karun?
troubleshooting.a4: Aap apne profile mein 'Tajweez ya Shikayat' ke ikhtiyar ke zariye support se rabta kar sakte hain. Apne masle ki tafseel se wazahat karein aur hamari team aap se rabta karegi. Fori masail ke liye, aap hamein ar162387@gmail.com par email bhi kar sakte hain. Hum 24-48 ghanton ke andar jawab dene ka hadaf rakhte hain.
